comment.author: 19114153@N06
comment._content: BuNo 130145 was actually built as a HRS-2 and delivered in August 1952. It's seen above in service with HMX-1 after upgrade to HRS-3 and modified with the 'Rocket-On-Rotor' system. For a more complete history of this aircraft, visit: www.hrs-helicopter.com.
